Reviews_Description: Yeh super stylish or comfortable car hai. Car ki performance, mileage or handling bhi acchi hai. Car ka A/C bhi bahut jaldi car ko thanda kar deta hai.

It's excellent to drive and wonder-full experience with this car and compared to other vehicles like SUVs its better choice to buy, and I love it, it will shake the market by its looks and by its performance and its comfort and its safety. Value for money car.

This is the most fantastic car ever. I love this car. And 4x4 variant is such a fantastic car with extra power and more features. And it's very spacious. It's a Fantastic Family car and the best for off-road traveling. For a long drive, it's very comfortable.
This is really awesome but in the petrol variant, mileage gets a loss and we can say that overall performance, build quality, interior, and comfort are awesome.
Good experience of driving and comfort with a stylish and attractive look only mileage is the average best car.
Mahindra Scorpio N is the best and strongest car. There is no answer to safety. Mahindra's Scorpio N is useful in 4X4 and an amazing offroading looks.

Mahindra Scorpio-N offers two engine options and two transmission choices. Transmission options include a 6-speed manual and a 6-speed torque converter automatic for both petrol and diesel engine options. For off-road enthusiasts, there is a 4x4 variant also on offer with the diesel engine only.
I thought it is a high luxury car, it is very comfortable, stylish, and very affordable in terms of its features or comfort.
Looks very beautiful. The engine is powerful Safety is very good, good mileage, and maintenance is very good. The best car in the market today.
It is the most worthy SUV in the segment. It comes with a lot of amazing features, which are useful in daily use.

Well done Mahindra. I was amazed when I was driving Mahindra Scorpio N Diesel a value for money package offered by mahindra. When you drive this car absolutely love this. Ride quality, seating position, ground clearance, suspension setup you feel like a boss when you drive this. First thing is seating position of this vehicle you can see both ...
Its performance is unbeatable, and its power is superb. It's a stylish and comfortable car in its segment,

Rating_Title: The New Mahindra Scorpio N Is Better Than Old Scorpio
Reviews_Description: The new Mahindra Scorpio N is better than the old Scorpio. You will not find so many features anywhere in this entire vehicle industry at this price. The best SUV there will ever build in India. No one can beat the design of Scorpio N.

The car has a very powerful engine that has very good off-roading capabilities. I took the car to various challenging terrains and the car outperformed every single time. I love the powerful engine and the sharp looks of the car.

The first priority is that the capacity of 7 passengers, well in comfort, mileage performance, good in maintenance cost, ground clearance is awesome , not any rattling sound create while driving in offroading, outer look good with bulky touch and the tail light good in shape. The overall new model is pretty.

The All-New Scorpio-N makes every drive an experience with its unmissable design, thrilling performance, advanced technology, intuitive features, superior comfort & safety. It truly is the Big Daddy of SUVs.

I think you can not find any better car at this price point. The pricing is very aggressive and it has all the new and latest features which we need in a car. The car has very good space in the cabin and the average is good as well.

Rating_Title: Good Car In This Price Segment
Reviews_Description: This is an amazing car, it looks good and it has great features with top-notch performance. Its safety features are also good. This is a great car in this price segment.

I am a Scorpio lover because its look is next level, as well as good mileage. We are very happy when we come to know that this is an Indian brand car. Its performance is good and I really enjoyed seeing them, one more thing in the crash test sure to get a 4 - 5-star rating.

I had various issues with this car which I came to know after driving it for a while. The boot is smaller than expected and is of no use. Thus, the interior, fit and finish are not at all good and feel cheap. The third row is very small and can't be used for long drives.
Very good with a comfortable seat and stylish and bold look gives a nice mileage and has a very good amount of space.

I was amazed to see the features of the Scorpio N as it has all the features that give you a premium feel. This is the best SUV car for you and your family. Its interior is very fun and very comfortable too. This top-class SUV comes at a very affordable price.

I have taken a test drive of Mahindra Scorpio N 2022, It was a good driving experience but when I went to check the comfort level in the third row, I felt totally disappointed. But in other aspects, this car proves itself to be the best. You could cover long distances in the car without feeling any jerk.
It looks pretty nice and new style car with nice features and high performance. It is an amazing SUV.

I went for the test drive for Mahindra Scorpio-N 2022 model. which I am planning to purchase, It was a superb experience at this price point. I have driven other SUVs but I found this best-in-class SUV in the price bracket of 12-20 lakhs. Its presence on the road is just awesome. I am super excited to own this.
The features and style of the car are very comfortable, I seriously like the interior and safety measures of the car. Mahindra is going really good now.
Superb SUV for a family with high safety, better features, and interior looks insanely awesome.

Scorpio n is looking so stylish, I am really amazed at its features and look. The SUV itself is a masterpiece and it offers lots of features which make it more attractive. I am really happy with the new Scorpio N.

Rating_Title: Good For Rough And Tough Use
Reviews_Description: This car is really good with luxurious features. The driving experience is best with 4x4 capability. It's good for rough and tough use.
This is under budget and a good car for family use with exciting features and looks.
